item.title: Leaves build up behind electrical junction box, 19th October
item.description:
The gap behind the electrical boxes needs to be keep clear of litter and leaves. It builds up a s then people leave more litter alongside it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St George's Square, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Commercial vehicle hasn't moved in months, 19th October
item.description:
A purple “Mister Cadbury” branded commercial van has been parked outside 127 St George’s Drive, SW1V, since around July and has not moved in months. It appears to be stored long-term in a residential parking bay. Late at night the driver often revs the engine, seemingly to charge the battery, which causes noise disturbance to nearby residents. Please investigate as a possible abandoned or nuisance vehicle.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 121A, St George's Drive, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime bikes on motorcycle only parking space, 19th October
item.description:
Several Lime bikes have been parked in the space clearly marked as reserved for motorcycles outside 78 Leander Road. One of the bikes is parked diagonally in front of a motorcycle blocking the way. There is no space left for other motorcycles that regularly park there. Lime bikes are constantly parked in this reserved space.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leander Road, Brixton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Replace bulb and paint lamppost, 19th October
item.description:
Hi, lamp post 207902 Please can the light bulb be replaced with a new LED bulb. The current bulb keeps flickering and not switching off in daylight. Is it also possible to request the post is repainted? It’s looking very neglected. Thanks. Richard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Alleyn Crescent, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New street name ., 19th October
item.description:
This has the incorrect street name sign ! The correct name should be HEVER CROFT and not road there are NO roads or streets on the Coldharbour est. Someone has painted white over the road to hide it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hever Croft, Coldharbour, London

item.title: Flytip of Laminate Flooring, 19th October
item.description:
Someone has flytipped their laminate flooring at the Weighton Gate entrance to Betts Park. It seems it is someone who lives local to the park. Disgusting behavior, especially as the park is usually kept clean.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Seymour Villas, Anerley, London

item.title: Flags at risk of falling on to carriageway, 19th October
item.description:
The flags that are cable tied to the railing along Wood Lane, above the A2, have come undone and are hanging on by a single corner, putting them at risk of coming completely undone and falling on to the carriageway below and potentially causing a crash, should they land on a moving vehicle
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wood Lane, Darenth, Dartford
Report on FixMyStreet
